title: Group portrait of eighteen children of Juniors of Homewood-Brushton Unit of the Urban League, including: Joyce Boulden, Geraldine Griffie, Francine Walker, Geraldine Toler, Beverly Scott fourth from left in second row, Muriel Henry, Carole Vaughn, Fifia Hoskin, Janis Monroe, Myra Monroe, Ruthman Washington, Elmer Robert "Bobby" Scott Jr. fourth from left in first row, Patsy McGuire, Phyllis Owens, Sybol Owens, and two women, sponsors Edythe V. Sandidge and Doris Dyer, posed behind table with striped cups and plates of food, for party
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
